item.title: Is buying and instantly selling bitcoin a good way to avoid exchange rates?
item.description:
Is buying and instantly selling bitcoin a good way to avoid exchange rates?

Answer (1 of 2): The key factor here is currency risk (see: Currency Risk Definition & Example), which manifests itself as the cost of starting in one currency and ending in another. For example: If you have EUR and want to buy USD, you have to find someone who already holds USD and is willing t...

item.title: Andrew Vegetabile of Litecoin Association Opposes DAO Fork - Bitcoinist.net
item.description:
Andrew Vegetabile of Litecoin Association Opposes DAO Fork - Bitcoinist.net

Andrew Vegetabile, Director of the Litecoin Association, came out against a fork of Ethereum/The DAO, Decrying interference with The DAO by outside crypto developers in an open letter to "Vitalik Buterin, The DAO, future smart contract developers, and the throngs of individuals within the crypto ecosystem" today.

item.title: The Crypto Show with Anthony Di'Iorio and Jim Blasko
item.description:
The Crypto Show with Anthony Di'Iorio and Jim Blasko

The fist hour we talk with Anthony about the recent Ethereum news and DAO hack. We also get into what's new with Jaxx.io and Decentral.ca including the new hardware product by Decentral called the Ice Cube. The second hour we talk with Jim Blasko about Voxelus a VR crypto currency being traded on several exchanges.

item.title: Bitcoin hype leads more to ask: what is blockchain? - FT.com
item.description:
Bitcoin hype leads more to ask: what is blockchain? - FT.com

It is a technology so new that many people in finance cannot explain what it is or what it might be able to do - yet they know they might have to worry about it. Demand from professionals for learning about blockchain, the technology that powers the

item.title: Bitcoin Price Technical Analysis for 06/20/2016 - Potential Selloff Levels - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Technical Analysis for 06/20/2016 - Potential Selloff Levels - NEWSBTC

Bitcoin price could be in for a sharp drop if traders decide to book profits off their recent long positions. Bitcoin Price Key Highlights Bitcoin price could be in for a sharp drop if traders decide to book profits off their recent long positions.

item.title: Singapore: Bitcoin exchange Quoine raises $20m venture investment
item.description:
Singapore: Bitcoin exchange Quoine raises $20m venture investment

Quoine , a Singapore-based Bitcoin exchange, has closed a $20 million funding round, leveraging off the large opportunity for Bitcoin in the Japanese market, led by venture capitalists (VCs) and other 'strategic investors'. The latest investment will see it shift its headquarters to Tokyo from Singapore. The Singapore office will remain as a subsidiary.

item.title: Ethereum Price Technical Analysis - Wait And Watch Mode - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Ethereum Price Technical Analysis - Wait And Watch Mode - NEWSBTC

Ethereum price remained under a lot of pressure, but if the sentiment remains stable, there is a chance of a minor correction in the near term. Ethereum price remained under a lot of pressure, but if the sentiment remains stable, there is a chance of a minor correction in the near term.

item.title: Can someone build a "Transferwise" application on the blockchain?
item.description:
Can someone build a "Transferwise" application on the blockchain?

Well, let's try it this way. The largest thing in the universe is the universe. The smallest meaningful length is the Planck length. There are 10^61 Planck lengths in the observable universe. So we'll split the difference and look for something 10^30 or 10^31 Planck lengths. That's about .01 to .1 millimeters.

item.title: Keep Calm & Bitcoin On ...As Brexit Vote Looms
item.description:
Keep Calm & Bitcoin On ...As Brexit Vote Looms

The much-anticipated Brexit vote will be held this Thursday, June 23rd , with polls showing an almost equal amount of people in favor of remaining as there are people in favor of leaving the EU. This has created an environment of uncertainty, leading people to search for alternative ways to secure their wealth.

item.title: Technical Analysis: Bitcoin Price Cycle Nearing a Close
item.description:
Technical Analysis: Bitcoin Price Cycle Nearing a Close

While fundamental analysts predict a continued rally to $1000 and beyond for the foreseeable future, technical indicators paint a more detailed picture. According to the charts, the ride up to $1000 will be bumpy, with periods of profit taking and resistance, especially around the $800 range.
